onChange.script:
import time
	# tag paths
	tagPath = '[default]Exchange/Water/Filters/Filter%s/Flow' %currentValue
	
	payload = {}
	payload['path'] = tagPath
	payload['friendly'] = 'Flow'
	payload['alias'] = tagPath
	payload['enabled'] = True
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage("setTagHistory", payload, "page")

config.script:
# Insert new Backwash line in backwash db table
	queryPath = "Exchange/INSERT New Backwash by Filter"
	
	# read filter tag values
	filterPath = '[default]Exchange/Water/Filters/Filter'+str(self.view.custom.selectedFilter)
	filterValues = system.tag.readBlocking(filterPath)[0].value
	
	params = {
		'filter':self.view.custom.selectedFilter,
		'start_time':system.date.now(),
		'level_before': float(filterValues['Level']),
		'flow_before': float(filterValues['Flow']),
		'loh_before': float(filterValues['LOH']),
		'turb_before': float(filterValues['Turb']),
		'backwash_type': 'M'
	}
	
	# run query
	system.db.runNamedQuery(queryPath, params)

# Mark filter as backwashing
	path = '[default]Exchange/Water/Filters/Filter{0}/Control/BackwashMode'.format(self.view.custom.selectedFilter)
	system.tag.writeBlocking([path], [2])
	
	# Start Backwash SFC
	exchange.water.sfc.SFC.Backwash(filterNumber=self.view.custom.selectedFilter).start()

tooltip.text: Backwash in progress on other Filter, please wait until finished before starting another backwash.

config.script:
params = {
	  "backwashNum": 1,
	  "filterNum": self.view.custom.selectedFilter,
	  "startTime": system.date.addWeeks(system.date.now(), -4),
	  "endTime": system.date.now(),
	  "options": False,
	  "name":"Last Filter "+str(self.view.custom.selectedFilter)+" Backwash"
	}
	
	system.perspective.openPopup("LastBackwash", "Exchange/Water/Reports/ReportViewBackwash", params, "Backwash Report", position = {'height':750}, modal = True, overlayDismiss = True)

		, 14: ''
		, 15: 'Waiting for filter flow to stop'
		, 16: ''
		, 17: 'Waiting for filter flow to decrease'
		, 18: ''
		, 19: 'Waiting for turbidity to drop below setpoint'
		, 20: ''
		, 21: 'Waiting for level to reach fill setpoint'
		, 22: ''
		, 23: 'Waiting for flow to normalize'
	}
	return stepDescription.get(value, '')

messageHandlers.script:

	self.view.custom.selectedFilter = payload['filterNum']
